Then we'll discuss "Slowing Down to the Speed of Life: How To Create A More Peaceful, Simpler Life From the Inside Out" by Richard Carlson.

Book Description

Feel like you're always rushing but never catching up? Are you doing more, but enjoying it less? The frantic pace and pressure of modern life can take a serious toll on your happiness and your health, but there is a way to step off the treadmill without giving up your career or activities. The answer lies not in sacrificing your work productivity or your lifestyle but rather in changing your attitude.
